data.headline: Experienced Data Scientist with Expertise in Academic Research
data.summary: Highly skilled Data Scientist with a strong background in academic research, specializing in data analysis, machine learning, and data-driven decision making.

experience.title: Research Data Scientist
bullets: Led the development of a novel predictive model for student retention, resulting in a 15% increase in graduation rates.
Designed and implemented a data visualization dashboard to track and analyze research project KPIs, improving data-driven decision making.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and address data-related challenges, contributing to the success of multiple research initiatives.

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
bullets: Conducted in-depth data analysis to support research projects, generating insights that informed strategic decision-making.
Developed and maintained data processing pipelines to ensure the integrity and reliability of research data.
Participated in the implementation of machine learning models to enhance the predictive capabilities of research studies.

projects.name: Predictive Model for Student Retention
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model to predict student dropout rates and identify at-risk students, enabling proactive intervention strategies.

projects.name: Research Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: Designed and implemented a data visualization dashboard to track and analyze key performance indicators for research projects, improving data-driven decision making.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Sofía Rodríguez, an experienced Data Scientist with expertise in academic research.
